&#3939;&#4001;&#3956;&#3928;&#3851;&#392: [1454] ... 1) sngo spyi/ bza' nyan pa dang bza' mi nyan pa tshang ma 'dus/ ... me tog dang sngo tshal gyi ldum ra khag so sor 'jog dgos/ ... 2) sne'u zhes pa'i sngo bza' nyan pa zhig  ... 3) (rnying) mkhar/ ...

shing thog.  sngo chung rigs.  tshal zhing dang skyed tshal.  Btsan-lha.  ro snyoms ldum bu byed / rtsa ldum gyis lus kyi nus pa rang bzhin snyoms par byed pa ste 'tsho ba'i don.  Gser Sbram 109.  See ldum bu re ral.
alms, begging for alm, any stalked plant
1) [stalked] plants [edible or not]; 2) Sne'u [herb med.]; 3) [arch] castle/ tower
